revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The experienced English housekeeper : for the use and ease of ladies, housekeepers, cooks, &c. : written purely from practice ... consisting of near nine hundred ori..."
revision.text: Possibly: The experienced English housekeeper : for the use and ease of ladies, housekeepers, cooks, &c. : written purely from practice ... consisting of near nine hundred original receipts, most of which never appeared in print ..., by Elizabeth Raffald. (London : Printed for the author, and sold by R. Baldwin ..., 1780). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/977904605
